pkgmetadata.longdescription: Target Controlled Infusion (TCI) // Implementation of target- controlled infusion algorithms for compartmental pharmacokinetic and pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic models. Jacobs (1990) doi:10.1109/10.43622; Marsh et al. (1991) doi:10.1093/bja/67.1.41; Shafer and Gregg (1993) doi:10.1007/BF01070999; Schnider et al. (1998) doi:10.1097/00000542-199805000-00006; Abuhelwa, Foster, and Upton (2015) doi:10.1016/j.vascn.2015.03.004; Eleveld et al. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.bja.2018.01.018.
